name: 郭五鳳
objective: This course is designed to increase undergraduate students' awareness and competence of the role of marketing research in decision-making. The technological milestones of the 21st century have changed our lives. Through the launch of the Google search engine, the deployment of social media, and the application of artificial intelligence (AI) technology, generative AI has dominated our human world since 2022. We will learn about global market trends and capitalize on career development. Case studies, research theories and methods deployment will be conducted in class.

14         11 Communicating the Research Results

scorePolicy: Case studies, research theories and methods deployment will be conducted in class. These assignments include team project presentations and individual presentations, which will be graded 25% for the midterm and 40% for the final exam. The remaining 35% of the overall grade is the student's attendance.
